title: Bug 6304 - Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: The bug report lacks sufficient details in the OB (Observed Behavior), EB (Expected Behavior), and SR (Steps to Reproduce) sections. I'll infer and supplement the information for clarity.
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the synchronization process fails or encounters unexpected behavior.
EB: The synchronization process for a .java file and another resource should complete successfully without encountering errors or unexpected behavior.
SR:
1. Open the IDE and navigate to the project containing a .java file and another resource.
2. Attempt to synchronize the .java file with the other resource.
3. Observe any error messages, unexpected behavior, or failure to synchronize.
